com.eightsines.holycycle

Class ViewControllerActivityDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eightsines.holycycle.ViewControllerActivityDelegate

  • public class ViewControllerActivityDelegate
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which transform Android-lifecycle to ViewController-lifecycle.

    If you can't use ViewControllerActivity, ViewControllerFragmentActivity, or ViewControllerAppCompatActivity (eg. you can't change base activity for some reason), use this class. See the ViewControllerActivity for example of use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewControllerActivityDelegate(android.app.Activity owner, ViewController controller)
      View controller delegate constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ViewControllerActivityDelegate

        public ViewControllerActivityDelegate(@NonNull
                                      android.app.Activity owner,
                                      @NonNull
                                      ViewController controller)
        View controller delegate constructor. Mostly you want use it like new ViewControllerActivityDelegate(this, this), however it is possible to separate host activity from the view controller.

        See the ViewControllerActivity for an example of use.

        Parameters:
        owner - Activity that owns the view controller.
        controller - Managed view controller.
